fields.name: Loan:
fields.value: Attack a player with your attack power.

fields.name: Interest:
fields.value: Attack someone you’ve previously failed to kill with lend. Your attack power from the failed attack will be added to your current attack power for this attack.

fields.name: Extortion:
fields.value: Attack someone you’ve previously failed to kill with Interest. Your attack power from Interest (including your attack power from Loan) will be added to your attack power this round.

fields.name: Busted (Passive):
fields.value: If you fail to kill with Extortion, your role will be outed via day announcements.
